title: Surrender @ 10 in ARAM
body:
It would be a lot easier to be able to surrender at 10mins into the game in some ARAMs. When you're 10-15 kills and a tower behind with an all melee team, the game just becomes painful. Especially when the enemy team drags the game out by another 5 minutes. 

Obviously the nature of arams is that the roll decides the game 70% of the time. But in some of those extreme situations where one team can just play however they want it really stops being fun.
